articles.description: The Paris 2024 Paralympic Games opening ceremony is under way in glorious conditions in the French capital.

articles.description: Lee Carsley will name his first England squad on Thursday after being named England interim head coach earlier this month.
articles.title: Who will be named in Lee Carsley's first England squad?

articles.description: Southampton agree a fee with Arsenal to sign England goalkeeper Aaron Ramsdale in a deal worth up to £25m.
articles.title: Aaron Ramsdale: Southampton agree £25m deal for Arsenal goalkeeper

articles.description: After more than two years of war, Ukraine aim to continue punching above their weight and to extend their remarkable Paralympic record.
articles.title: Paralympics 2024: Ukraine's preparations amid war

articles.description: Real Madrid forward Vinicius Jr says he and his team-mates will leave the pitch if they face any more racism this season.
articles.title: Vinicius Jr: Real Madrid forward says team will walk off if they face racism

articles.description: Who is incoming Liverpool winger Federico Chiesa, what can he bring to the Anfield club, and why is he so cheap?
articles.title: Federico Chiesa: Liverpool transfer target a 'fantastic player' but a 'dangerous move'

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Nottingham Forest vs Newcastle United in the League Cup
articles.title: Nottingham Forest vs Newcastle United: League Cup - BBC Sport

articles.description: Britain's Harriet Dart suffers a painful defeat as she loses to Ukrainian 19th seed Marta Kostyuk in the US Open second round at a sweltering Flushing Meadows.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Harriet Dart loses to Marta Kostyuk in a sweltering New York

articles.description: Stand-in captain Ollie Pope wants to "reward" his England side by scoring runs in the second Test against Sri Lanka at Lord's.
articles.title: England v Sri Lanka: Ollie Pope wants to 'reward' his side with runs

articles.description: Jonny Evans' legacy as a Northern Ireland great is secure as the defender calls time on his 18-year international career.
articles.title: Jonny Evans: 'Defender retires as one of Northern Ireland's greats'
